document_data.name: The Company of the Torch
document_data.mainbody: '''The Company of the Torch''' was an [[adventuring company]] based in [[Starmantle]] on the [[Dragon Coast]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/58/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye|26}}
document_data.History: Some time before around [[1357 DR]], The Company of the Torch went against the brigand known as the [[Black Blade (brigand)|Black Blade]] and she was thought to have slaughtered them in their entirety.
